bike.description: WSD Alpha Platinum Aluminum w/ABP Convert, Full Floater, E2 tapered head tube, aluminum EVO Link, replaceable derailleur hanger, 120mm travel

FSA NO.57E, E2, ACB sealed bearings
Shimano SLX M666 hydraulic disc brakes
